metadata.name: MEIWE
metadata.description:
·   This is a special sample version based on my video work "MEIWE". The length of the original work is 09 minutes and 28 seconds, and the length of this special version is 60 seconds.
·   1280 x 720 | color | sound | HD Video
·   For a large number of running enthusiasts today, if his running data cannot be recorded and displayed by mobile applications, his "running" action does not exist; in other words, we are actually running at the data/media level. This point is also echoed in the video works: the icon design of "MEIWE" has three versions of red, yellow and green, corresponding to the three colors recorded in different running states in the mobile phone application. This kind of appropriation is an abstract operation unique to our era: data has transcended its digital form, and has been selected by artists as form factors to achieve a wider symbolic or communication value. This seems to indicate that the media has the possibility of inducing culture/religion…………
